price: He punishes whom He wills and shows mercy to whom He wills, and to Him you will all be returned.
arabic: يُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرۡحَمُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُقۡلَبُونَ
